alert.note: Alert for Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 19 at 2:47PM MST until February 21 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches, except 6 to 12 inches above 6500 feet. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Albion, Almo, Malta, Rockland, and Holbrook. * WHEN...From Monday evening through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
